class.name: ChainLoader
class.brief: Static use class for loading .root files into a TChain
class.doc:
Static class used for loading files into TChains. Can be used to load an entire directory, or files from a filelist.lis
---
**Headers** : "ChainLoader.h" **Source** : "ChainLoader.cpp"
### ChainLoader Example usage
``` cpp TChain * chain = new TChain( "treeName" ); ChainLoader::load( chain, "path_to_dir_containg_.roots", maxFilesToLoad ); ```
Or if you are running parallel or want to load from a file list use:
``` cpp TChain * chain = new TChain( "treeName" ); ChainLoader::load( chain, "path_to_dir_listfile.lis", maxFilesToLoad ); ```
